price: 51. (Xus) markaan la sameennay ballan Muuse muddo afartan habeen ah, markaas aad yeelateen dibi (aad caabuddaan) kaddib (markuu tagey), waxaad tihiinna daalimiin (gar ma qaatayaal ah).
arabic: وَإِذۡ وَٰعَدۡنَا مُوسَىٰٓ أَرۡبَعِينَ لَيۡلَةٗ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ وَأَنتُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh wāʿadnā mūsā arbaʿīna laylatan thumma ittakhadhtumu al-ʿij'la min baʿdihi wa-antum ẓālimūna
